title: ennaDu juthunO
sahitya:
ennaDu jUtunO inakula tilaka nin-



anupallavi



pannagashayana bhakta janAvana punnamacanduru bOlu mukhamunu



caraNam



dharaNija saumitri bharata ripughna vAnara yUdhapati

varudAnjanEyuDu

    karunanu okari kokaru varNimpa nAdarananu bilacE ninnu

tyAgarAjArcita
